text: ciqtrayA# yajEta paqSukA#ma iqyaM ~Mvai ciqtrA yadvA aqsyAM ~MviSva#M BUqtamadhi# praqjAya#tEq tE nEqya~jciqtrA ya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gg) SciqtrayA# paqSukA#mOq yaja#tEq pra praqjayA# paqSuBi# rmithuqnai rjA#yatEq praivAgnEqyEna# vApayatiq rEta#H sauqmyEna# dadhAtiq rEta# Eqva hiqtaM tvaShTA# rUqpANiq vi ka#rOtisArasvaqtau Ba#vata Eqtadvai daivya#M mithuqnaM daivya#mEqvAsmai# - [  ]  17
